languages.text: "Что ж, такой жест определенно отразится на всем протекторате, но вердикт вынесен. Заседание объявляется закрытым!"

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, такой жест определенно отразится на всем протекторате, но вердикт вынесен. Заседание объявляется закрытым!"
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"
languages.original_text: "Что ж, такой жест определенно отразится на всем протекторате, но вердикт вынесен. Заседание объявляется закрытым!"

traits.locale_text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"
"Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"
"Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"
"Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"
"Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"
"Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"

languages.text: "Tja, eine solche Geste wird sich im Protektorat gewiss herumsprechen, aber Urteil ist Urteil. Die Sitzung ist damit geschlossen."
languages.original_text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: "Tja, eine solche Geste wird sich im Protektorat gewiss herumsprechen, aber Urteil ist Urteil. Die Sitzung ist damit geschlossen."

languages.text: « Un tel geste ne manquera pas d'avoir des répercussions à travers l'ensemble du protectorat, mais un verdict est un verdict. Sur ce, la séance est close ! »
languages.original_text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: « Un tel geste ne manquera pas d'avoir des répercussions à travers l'ensemble du protectorat, mais un verdict est un verdict. Sur ce, la séance est close ! »

languages.text: “了解，这样的判决肯定会在整个王朝内引起反响，但判决就是判决。本次审判到此结束！”
languages.original_text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: “了解，这样的判决肯定会在整个王朝内引起反响，但判决就是判决。本次审判到此结束！”

languages.text: «Bueno, un gesto como ese se hará eco por todo el protectorado, pero un veredicto es un veredicto. ¡Se levanta la sesión!».
languages.original_text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, un gesto como ese se hará eco por todo el protectorado, pero un veredicto es un veredicto. ¡Se levanta la sesión!».

languages.text: 「まあ、そのような行為は確実に保護領全体に波紋を広げるでしょうが、判決は判決です。この審理はこれにて終了します！」
languages.original_text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: 「まあ、そのような行為は確実に保護領全体に波紋を広げるでしょうが、判決は判決です。この審理はこれにて終了します！」

languages.text: "Bu denli bir tutumun protektorada epey ses getireceği açık. Madem hükmünüz bu yönde... Duruşma bitmiştir!"
languages.original_text: "Well, a gesture like that is certain to reverberate throughout the protectorate, but a verdict is a verdict. This session is now concluded!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu denli bir tutumun protektorada epey ses getireceği açık. Madem hükmünüz bu yönde... Duruşma bitmiştir!"
